77 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
78 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e NXP_Measure(void) {
79  N775_Meas(&n775_stateBase);
80  return STD_OK;
81 }
82 
83 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e NXP_Initialize(void) {
84  PEX_SetPinDirectionOutput(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER3, PEX_PIN10);
85  PEX_SetPin(PEX_PORT_EXPANDER3, PEX_PIN10);
86  /* Leave time for the PEX to be triggered in the 10ms task */
87  uint32_t current_time = OS_GetTickCount();
88  OS_DelayTaskUntil(&current_time, 10u);
89  return STD_OK;
90 }
91 
92 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e NXP_StartMeasurement(void) {
93  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_NOT_OK;
94 
95  /* if (N775_SetStateRequest(N775_STATE_INITIALIZATION_REQUEST) == N775_OK) {
96  retval = STD_OK;
97  } */
98 
99  return retval;
100 }
101 
102 extern bool NXP_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(void) {
103  return N775_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(&n775_stateBase);
104 }
105 
106 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e NXP_RequestIoWrite(uint8_t string) {
107  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_NOT_OK;
108  return retval;
109 }
110

114 }
